ComicInfo.Title: Book Two: The Devil's Business Chapter One; Book Two: The Devil's Business Prologue
ComicInfo.Summary: The second arc of FATALE begins here! In modern times, Nicolas Lash hunts for more information about the mysterious Josephine... while in mid-1970s Los Angeles, Jo is trying to establish a new life. But this is post-free love LA, post Manson Family LA, and the hills of Hollywood have dark secrets all their own. BRUBAKER and PHILLIPS's horror-noir masterpiece continues!
